h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: He can also spin in place while using his appendages to grab a snow-covered rock out of the ground, using his momentum to slam it down on you for a startling amount of damage, requiring you to dodge quickly to avoid taking damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
He can also spin in place while using his appendages to grab a snow-covered rock out of the ground, using his momentum to slam it down on you for a startling amount of damage, requiring you to dodge quickly to avoid taking damage.
